Text: It is a black and white movie. Excellent quality though.
Please seed your last film Goodbye Lenin so someone could get it down
I seeded it until my client showed 11 seeders. I deleted it afterwards. Sorry. It should have sustained itself, had it presented any interest.
Im a bit suprised since I got it quite soon after you uploaded it, but I do have a quite slow connection. Im stuck at 78.99% :( (The film do exist here as an avi but I thinks thats too low quality)
